response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while securing this remarkable item before it potentially becomes more sought-after and possibly priced higher in the future. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 14000}
